TopicTitle: small contract window in flight/VAB => add funds reward

Articles.Content:
It would be good to know also what was the expected reward for one or more contracts while building a vessel (to know how much it worth building vessel, ie not building a 100000 funds vessel for a 1000 reward) and in flight (as a reminder).

Edited July 21, 2014 by Justin Kerbice
words order change in title

I think the title of this suggestion could use some clarification (change it by selecting "Edit Post" on the original post, and then "Go Advanced"- which will enable you to edit the title as well), but it's definitely a good idea that could use some love. A way to see the rewards that can be earned for existing active contracts while in the VAB/SPH would be great.

It's nice to know how much we can stand to earn in the near future, so we know how much we need to leave in the bank in terms of funds...

Regards,

Northstar

I made an account just to voice my opinion that a mod to improve the contracts outside of mission control would be most appreciated.

I would like the ability to open a window with all accepted contracts and view their all their details. Then I would like to be able to select which contracts I am specifically tracking for the mission I am running at the time (or designing for).

Furthermore, I want to be able to view active contracts (the ones I selected) separate and at the same time as my fuel/electric screen in the top left.

Here's to hoping!

-Tom

The contracts window during flight is quite small, and hard to keep track of what to do for each flight. Some sort of mission planning would be useful - specify which contracts are applicable for a particular launch, sort them in order of expected completion, and dislay all (or just next) during flight. When I have many open contracts, and a launch intended to fulfill some subset of them, it is difficult to see precisely what I need to do when.

In the absence of above, just having a resizable contracts window would help somewhat.
